creator: serch@acme.com
text:
when I send a file to tomcat I can catch it from catalina, but when I send it 
over MOD_WEBAPP the file I got is shorter than the original
I also found that every char 0xFF is dumped of the received file

creator: pier@betaversion.org
text:
This has been fixed in CVS. You can download a nightly snapshot from 
http://nagoya.apache.org/~pier/

creator: serch@acme.com
text:
Which one should I download?
cause I tried with webapp-module-20011113.tar.gz and I got the same problem
